Container.Name: phs.plexbeta
Container.Overview: This is a template with pass through of all your DVB Tuners.[br] Tvheadend is a TV streaming server. It's possible to pass through a DVB adapter. Instructions on how to do that is in the support thread. It is compiled with support for HDHomerun.[br] http://tvheadend.org[br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it's databases and configuration.[br][br] [b]/recordings[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it's recordings. You will have to edit the path in the configuration tab to /recordings or else the volume mapping will not work.[br][br] [b]/data[/b] : This is where the tv_grab_wg script will look for the guide.xml. This is only for use with WebGrab+Plus. Ignore if you do not use WebGrab+Plus for EPG data.[br][br]
